author: mdhildreth
body: Fix configuration of SiStrip noise in PreMixing so that the "validation" and "production" modes have the same settings.  (doh).  (The "production" mode was correct, btw.)  Found and suppressed a bunch of Hcal printout that should have been removed earlier.
title: Configure SiStrip noise the same in production and validation modes! Sup...
